TopicTitle: Can OpenGL be forced on MacOS or is that impossible?

Articles.Content:
This exists from 2017/2019:

But is there any way to force OpenGL in 2024?

Referring to https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/OpenGLCoreDetails.html, you could try launching your game with -force-gles as a launch flag. I don't know how exactly to set that on mac, but the CKAN option should work.- If you're using CKAN, go to settings - Game command line and add -force-gles to the end with a space to separate it from the previous argument.
